comment: I was an SI for this professor and she was sweet. I took 2101 with another professor, I will say she doesn't space out her projects very well. There were some weeks where students had exams, projects and essays due within days of each other. Many of these assignments, I never had to do. This class can be hard so you will have to study a good bit.

Great professor, especially for accounting. She drops 3 quizzes, 1 test, and 3 homework assignments. gives extra credit. There are si sessions if needed. Come to class or you will be confused, even though it's not mandatory. she explains everything clearly. if you come to class and do the review sessions you should be fine.

I 100% recommend Professor Ha! She drops 3 HW, 3 Quizzes, and 1 test. She gives us lecture notes and actually puts in the work during the class to fill them out with us. If you just memorize the study guides and practice exam questions and answers you should be good along with completing the hw and quizzes.

Multiple McCgraw Hill assignments to do in a week, and all the tests are on proctorio. Very invasive, but understanding. There will be an SI in your class, and they also can help you. It is one of the hardest classes to do, but if you put in the work and actually pay attention, you will do great! So much extra credit.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment: Professor Ha was overall a good professor. She gives a lot of help with assignments as she drops the lowest 3 homework's, 2 lowest quizzes, and lowest midterm, in addition to that she also gives around 75 bonus points which is equivalent to 7.5 points in her class as its out of 1000 points. I would go more in depth but there's a word limit of 350.

Professor Ha genuinely cared about our success in this course, she drops the lowest test scores, homework and quiz. She gives out a lot of extra credit which really helped me perform well in the class. The questions on the exam review q's are similar if not the same as on the test. Acct is hard, but if you work hard you'll get the grade u deserve.

be prepared to do ALOT of work lol, good teacher but there will be weeks where you have a project homework's quizzes and a test due extremely close together. I would say it is easy to pass this just heavy workload. Does drop some grades and gives extra credit!

Very nice professor, but it is a lot of work. You probably won't pass without the extra credit unless you put in the work. Its a very difficult class, and all the tests are lockdown browsers with a live person watching you.

BESTTT ACCT prof, gives a lot of extra credit. drops 3 lowest HW, 2 lowest quizzes, and 1 lowest test grade. Accounting is not an easy class not matter what professor you have but Kelly did make it easier. 3 tests and 1 cumulative final. provides helpful test review&practice for each test that are the same as the test. Proctored&Wedcam tests

2101 is a hard class because it's new, but she is a great professor! Very kind. She does go fast, but she doesn't have much of a choice because it's a lot of material. Lotttsss of homework though, but is important because you need the practice. She is fair about deadlines for the most part though. I would take her again!

Very nice lady but I'm unsure how she has such a high rating. She moves too quickly through all of the work, I've gone to every single SI session and am still pretty lost a majority of the time. The class is hard, a lot of time and effort needs to be put into it, not a class you can sit back and drift through.

her lectures were very hard to follow 4 me due to her accent ... shes a nice girl tho but it was hard a*. 2-4 mcgraw math homeworks per week. i would say avoid, ive heard other classes had it easier than us

Be sure to stay on top of all of your McGraw assignments. Each of the exam reviews are very similar to their respective exams, don't forget to look at them while studying. There is one excel project that is quite easy as long as you pay attention to the guided videos.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Absolutely loved Dr. Ha! Such a sweet and lovely woman. A lot of people found this course difficult, but it's not rocket science, just a learning curve since Accounting is a new subject for everyone. It's pretty easy if you just practice and put in some study time. TONS of extra credit. A lot of homework, but we work on them in class sometimes.

Professor Ha is amazing. I struggled with accounting but she gave so much extra credit that I ended up with a B. She offers extra credit for coming to class so if you show up you'll earn a lot of extra credit. She gives a review for each test that is pretty helpful. Tests were pretty hard, lockdown and webcam, but she prepares you well for them.

Not great but not bad, doesn't offer too much extra credit but does offer extra credit randomly for showing up to class. I was struggling and emailed her 3 times throughout the semester and she wasn't much help. Not sure if I would take her again.

Excellent Professor, All of the notes are well organized. Her exams are Lockdown browser but she gives you 2 days to complete them. The study guides are very very helpful on exams. The homework assignments aren't time-consuming and neither are the quizzes. She does not save lecture notes so show up to class or have someone send them to you.

Lots of extra credit and opportunities to bring up your grade throughout the semester. Attendance isn't mandatory but she doesn't post the completed notes, only the blank ones so it's best to attend class. 4 tests and a final exam, but your lowest test grade gets dropped. Overall easy accounting class compared to other professors.

Attendance was not mandatory, but she offered extra credit for those who showed up. The material is difficult so you will need to study. She gives two home work assignments due every Sunday. She drops lowest test and offers plenty of extra credit.

She is passionate about teaching and is very understandable to the students needs. . She gives a lot of extra credit when she sees that the class isn't doing too well or that we need it. If you just attend class then you'll pass the class. She is a very easy going teacher and highly recommend if you're taking accounting.

Professor Ha is a fast lecturer but always takes questions and backtracks if needed. The work isn't easy, but she makes it easy to understand by providing guided notes and plenty of online tools to prepare for exams. She's generous with extra credit and extends deadlines if needed. I would take every class with her if I could!

She's super nice & wants you to succeed. However, I fell behind when it came to her talking super fast.. However, her extra credit opportunities helped my grade pull from a C to a solid B! If she went slower I feel like I would've learned more. Sit in the front, but if you can retain information fast take her then! Attendance = Extra Credit!

Mrs.Ha is a good class. Every test is lockdown browser and are very hard. She also does talk fast so if you cant keep up, ask her for help and she will help you. DO ALL THE EXTRA CREDIT. You will need it. Take all the notes you can and study study study!!! This class is really really hard but afterwards you feel accomplished

If you are required to take accounting, I recommend taking it with Kelly Ha. She is a great person and genuinely cares about your grade. It is not an easy class, and it has a heavy workload (time consuming projects, lots of homework, and difficult quizzes/exams). She does offer a lot of extra credit and attendance is not mandatory.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework

comment: LOVE HER ! Accounting is a hard class but Kelly makes this class easier. Great guided notes and I would take her again. She was very caring and wants students to pass.
She gives a lot of extra credit, however teaches EXTREMELY fast and it is hard to keep up on the notes. Her test were in person which was extremely difficult as well.

If you put in the effort and come to class, you'll pass with a high grade. Accounting is not a class you can slack off in, but if you're struggling, Ms. Ha goes above and beyond to help you succeed. There's multiple ways in receiving extra credit, her quizzes are open note, and the test is based off past course material. Take her!! She's amazing!

Prof Ha was extremely sweet but if your are not a business/accounting major you will be completely lost. The lectures were way too fast and I felt like there was so much homework and not enough time to finish it. To be fair she gives a lot of extra credit but I did more work in that class than I did for other classes that aligned with my major.

Prof Ha was really enthusiastic about teaching accounting. I didn't find the class or content to be too difficult but it is all brand new if you've never taken accounting before. There was a good bit of homework, five quizzes, two tests, a group project, and a four part final. Prof Ha is really good for first time accounting students!

She is a sweet teacher and she means well, but sometimes she just rushes through things during class. She makes concepts that are really easy 10x harder than they really are. She offers outside help and that is her saving grace as a professor because she teachers better to a smaller group of people than a whole class. Bonus, lots of extra credit.
